summary: 1999 CHEVROLET VENTURE MINIVAN INTAKE MANIFOLD GASKET FAILED CAUSING DEXCOOL COOLANT TO LEAK INTO THE ENGINE AND MIX WITH THE OIL.  A SIMPLE INTERNET SEARCH FOUND LITERALLY THOUSANDS OF OTHER FOLKS WITH THE SAME PROBLEM.  GM CUSTOMER ASSISTANCE DENIES A PROBLEM.  IT COSTS AN AVERAGE OF $650-$1000.00  TO FIX THIS GASKET WITH NO ASSURANCE THAT A NEW IMPROVED GASKET IS IN PLACE.  THIS SEEMS TO HAPPEN SHORTLY AFTER THE 36,000 MILES WARRANTY COVERAGE IS UP.  PLEASE SEE: WWW.PETITIONONLINE.COM/GMCNSMRS/PETITION.HTML.    *NLM
